name: updatePriority
description:
Updates an issue priority.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

id.description: The ID of the issue priority.

iconUrl.description: The URL of an icon for the priority. Accepted protocols are HTTP and HTTPS. Built in icons can also be used.

name.description: The name of the priority. Must be unique.

statusColor.description: The status color of the priority in 3-digit or 6-digit hexadecimal format.
